verses.verse: Oh come <WH3212>, let us sing <WH7442> unto Jehovah <WH3068>; Let us make a joyful noise <WH7321> to the rock <WH6697> of our salvation <WH3468>.
Let us come <WH6923> before his presence <WH6440> with thanksgiving <WH8426>; Let us make a joyful noise <WH7321> unto him with psalms <WH2158>.
For Jehovah <WH3068> is a great <WH1419> God <WH410>, And a great <WH1419> King <WH4428> above all gods <WH410>.
In his hand <WH3027> are the deep places <WH4278> of the earth <WH776>; The heights <WH8443> of the mountains are his also <WH2022>.
The sea <WH3220> is his <WH6213>, and he made it <WH3027>; And his hands formed <WH3335> the dry land <WH3006>.
Oh come <WH935>, let us worship <WH7812> and bow down <WH3766>; Let us kneel <WH1288> before <WH6440> Jehovah <WH3068> our Maker <WH6213>:
For he is our God <WH430>, And we are the people <WH5971> of his pasture <WH4830>, and the sheep <WH6629> of his hand <WH3027>. To-day <WH3117>, oh that ye would hear <WH8085> his voice <WH6963>!
Harden <WH7185> not your heart <WH3824>, as at Meribah <WH4808>, As in the day <WH3117> of Massah <WH4531> in the wilderness <WH4057>;
When your fathers <WH1> tempted <WH5254> me <WH974>, Proved me <WH7200>, and saw my work <WH6467>.

Forty <WH705> years <WH8141> long was I grieved <WH6962> with that generation <WH1755>, And said <WH559>, It is a people <WH5971> that do err <WH8582> in their heart <WH3824>, And they have not known <WH3045> my ways <WH1870>:
Wherefore I sware <WH7650> in my wrath <WH639>, That they should not enter <WH935> into my rest <WH4496>.
